name: CryptDivers
description:
CRYPTDIVERS

A score chasing arena game in the vein of Quake/Serious Sam.

===========================================================

Use the environment to your advantage and kite enemies around the room.

There are bounce pads in the corners if you need breathing room from the horde.

Remember to keep an eye above for extra weapons.

Big enemies will drop supplies, small enemies will drop ammo.

CONTROLS

===========================================================

Fire - Left click

Previous weapon - Scroll up

Next weapon - Scroll down

Jump - Space Bar

Crouch - C

Walk - Shift

(Auto run is always on)
